creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: sketchy image in red, green and purple; sketchy figure in red at L center; purple and green foliage at R; trees with red flowers or fruits behind figure
markings: LLC of image on back, stamped in purple: [COLLECTION/ A CLOT/ ATELIER]
provenance: Auguste Clot Estate, Paris; Samuel Josefowitz, Lausanne and Whitchurch-on-Thames; (R. M. Light & Company, Inc., Santa Barbara, Calif.); sold to MIA, 2007.
title: Woman in Red in a Landscape
